key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party manufacturers in Asia
Legal and regulatory risks including class-action lawsuits and patent disputes
Intense market competition from rivals like Cisco and TP-Link
Dependence on consumer spending, making it vulnerable to economic downturns
controversies: Multiple class-action lawsuits over defective products and misleading advertising
Patent infringement case with Huawei over WiFi 6 technology
Frequent security vulnerabilities and patches in NetGear products
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing environmental impact through energy-efficient products and eco-friendly packaging
social_issues: Potential damage to customer trust due to cybersecurity vulnerabilities
governance_issues: Legal liabilities from class-action lawsuits and patent disputes
